overview: During a normal day at a shopping square in Amman, Sami, a 15 year old spoiled naive kid, and the street-smart hustler Mahmoud, a 15 year old corn seller, are ready to execute their plan to steal an unexpected gift that will impress Samiâ€™s girlfriend, unbeknownst to them  what unexpected twists and turns are about to come their way.
title: Arnoos
